name: Canberra Cycling Club
tagline: Ride, Race, and Connect with Passion.
description: The Canberra Cycling Club fosters a welcoming cycling community, promoting healthy living through cycling in Canberra. Whether you're a seasoned rider or just starting out, join us for races, social rides, and events that connect cyclists across the Canberra region.

content.heading: Our Mission
paragraphs: At the Canberra Cycling Club, we aim to provide a safe and inclusive environment for cyclists of all ages and abilities. Our mission is to promote cycling as a sport and recreational activity in our beautiful city.

content.heading: Our History
paragraphs: Founded in 1975, the Canberra Cycling Club has a rich history of bringing together cycling enthusiasts from all walks of life. Over the years, we've grown into a vibrant community that shares a love for cycling and competition.

content.heading: Upcoming Races
paragraphs: Stay updated with our schedule of racing events, including criteriums, time trials, and more. We host races suitable for all skill levels, and we encourage everyone to participate!

content.heading: Social Rides
paragraphs: Join us for our weekly social rides! Our community gatherings foster friendship among cyclists while enjoying the stunning scenery of Canberra. All riders are welcome.

content.heading: Join Us
paragraphs: Become a member of the Canberra Cycling Club and enjoy exclusive benefits, such as entry discounts for events, access to our training programs, and a supportive network of fellow cyclists.

content.heading: Membership Tiers
paragraphs: We offer various membership tiers to accommodate different needs, whether you‚Äôre a recreational rider or a competitive cyclist. Check our membership page for details.

content.heading: Get in Touch
paragraphs: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out with any inquiries about memberships, events, or cycling in general.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Joining the Canberra Cycling Club has transformed my cycling experience! The community is fantastic.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.text: We are proud of our diverse membership and the impactful events we organize throughout the year.

services.title: Training Programs
services.description: Join our structured training programs designed to improve your cycling skills, whether you‚Äôre a beginner or looking to compete.

services.title: Weekly Group Rides
services.description: Participate in our weekly group rides to enjoy cycling alongside others, explore new routes, and make new friends.

footer.description: Explore the joy of cycling with Canberra Cycling Club! Join us to embark on your cycling journey today.
